page.title: 07M. O. T. E. C.
page.content: The main aim of MOTEC is the training of apprentices in the{Road Transport} Industry. The training unit has been designed to provide realistic working conditions in which{apprentices}can have experience of all aspects of the trade. Those selected for this training come from the Road Transport Industry but there is also a training plan for{Youth Opportunity(unemployed {youngsters)}in this ultra modern, highly technical and well organized unit. The apprentices and occasionally,management course people all enjoy superb recreational facilities such as cinema,sports field,games hall, squash courts and swimming pool, under the supervision of qualified staff. However the future of MOTEC is unsure because of high costs. The building was opened in 1972.
